en-GB.name: League Preferences Administration
en-GB.help: Using the league prefences league and global administrators can change some of the settings for a league without modifying the PHP files.
en-GB.prime_help: The primary tournament is used for the front page league table
en-GB.second_help: The primary division is used for front page player performance stats
en-GB.forum_url_help: The link to use in the Forum button on the main menu. Leave this blank for no forum.
en-GB.welcome_help: Message to appear at the top of the home page. This can be HTML.
en-GB.rules_help: The rules to display under the Rules menu. This can be HTML.
en-GB.failedValidate: Oh Noes! The league administration module has failed the ptid!=stid check. Please alert your administrator!
en-GB.failedSave: Sorry, you don't have permission to update this league
